casebody.data:
Richmond

Richard Carroll Green v. Commonwealth of Virginia. March 6, 1972. Record No. 7770.

Present, Snead, C.J., Carrico, Gordon, Harrison, Cochran and Harman, JJ.

R. R. Ryder, for plaintiff in error. A. R. Woodroof, Assistant Attorney General (Andrew P. Miller, Attorney General, on brief), for defendant in error.

Judgment affirmed without opinion by equally divided Court.
